title: Removal of Cr(VI) in wastewater by Fe–Mn oxide loaded sludge biochar
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11746-11757
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00169A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chaoyang Yu, Jinyan Yang
Sludge biochar loaded with Fe–Mn oxides (FMBC) was prepared and employed to remove Cr(VI) from wastewater.
